Room.Name: The Healing Hand
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small building with a lot of white, healing lights.
Room.LongDescription: A number of clerics and priests give their time to come to help people who have been severely injured. They give their time freely because it is the way of their religion, and a helping hand is never really ever forgotten. You may rest here in peace without being disturbed until you have been completely healed.
